author: Armand Welsh
releaseNotes:
1.9.x revisions:
1.9.6 - Fix type cast conversion error on line 1610.
1.9.5 - Fix Null pointer when updating some groups lighting values.
1.9.4 - Change minimum level reported to HE to 1, if hue device is on
1.9.3 - Fixed scene bug to turn off active scene when group is turned off.
1.9.2 - Fixed Hue Group handling of color / saturation changes not working on hue hub.  Added support for colorName reporting.  Removed redundant device info from group logging.
1.9.1 - Fixed bug resulting in wrong temperatures reported on temp sensors.
1.9.0 - Added RunLessWires Friends of Hue switch. (Thanks to @pocketgeek)
1.8.x revisions:
1.8.6 - Removed colormode state assignment, which has been removed from the Hue API, and no longer works.  With this change in Hue, some non-hue lighs will no longer work in groups correctly.  I do not have a fix for this Hue change.
1.8.5 - Modified the main app to support devices w/o label defined.
1.8.4 - Fixed errors reported in log when adding a new hue group.
1.8.3 - Fix for default scene of group that prevents the group from turning on when scened default scene is defined.  This appears to be a change in Hue hub behavior, possibly related to v2 API updates. 
1.8.2 - Update dimmer and tap devices to allow pressing the same button multiple times, without losing the press event. 
1.8.1 - Correct the Hue Tap device name so the applicaiton can correctly associate the Tap button device to the device driver.
